mapper.select: select id, hosp_code, visit_id, settle_id, payment_settle_id, payment_settle_type, visit_no, total_price, payment_price, pay_code, status_code, settle_code, omsgid, oinfno, remark, invalid_time, update_id, update_name, update_time, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,settle_no,order_no from payment_order where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into payment_order(id,hosp_code, visit_id, settle_id, payment_settle_id, payment_settle_type, visit_no, total_price, payment_price, pay_code, status_code, settle_code, omsgid, oinfno, remark, invalid_time, update_id, update_name, update_time, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,settle_no,order_no) values (#{id},#{hospCode}, #{visitId}, #{settleId}, #{paymentSettleId}, #{paymentSettleType}, #{visitNo}, #{totalPrice}, #{paymentPrice}, #{payCode}, #{statusCode}, #{settleCode}, #{omsgid}, #{oinfno}, #{remark}, #{invalidTime}, #{updateId}, #{updateName}, #{updateTime}, #{crteId}, #{crteName}, #{crteTime}, #{settleNo},#{orderNo})

insert into payment_order(id,hosp_code, visit_id, settle_id, payment_settle_id, payment_settle_type, visit_no, total_price, payment_price, pay_code, status_code, settle_code, omsgid, oinfno, remark, invalid_time, update_id, update_name, update_time, crte_id, crte_name, crte_time,settle_no,order_no) values
(#{entity.id},#{entity.hospCode}, #{entity.visitId}, #{entity.settleId}, #{entity.paymentSettleId}, #{entity.paymentSettleType}, #{entity.visitNo}, #{entity.totalPrice}, #{entity.paymentPrice}, #{entity.payCode}, #{entity.statusCode}, #{entity.settleCode}, #{entity.omsgid}, #{entity.oinfno}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.invalidTime}, #{entity.updateId}, #{entity.updateName}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.crteId}, #{entity.crteName}, #{entity.crteTime},#{entity.settleNo}, #{entity.orderNo})
mapper.update:
update payment_order
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
visit_id = #{visitId},
settle_id = #{settleId},
payment_settle_id = #{paymentSettleId},
payment_settle_type = #{paymentSettleType},
visit_no = #{visitNo},
total_price = #{totalPrice},
payment_price = #{paymentPrice},
pay_code = #{payCode},
status_code = #{statusCode},
settle_code = #{settleCode},
omsgid = #{omsgid},
oinfno = #{oinfno},
remark = #{remark},
invalid_time = #{invalidTime},
update_id = #{updateId},
update_name = #{updateName},
update_time = #{updateTime},
crte_id = #{crteId},
crte_name = #{crteName},
crte_time = #{crteTime},
settle_no = #{settleNo},
order_no = #{orderNo},
where id = #{id}

update payment_order
total_price = #{totalPrice},
payment_price = #{paymentPrice},
pay_code = #{payCode},
settle_code = #{settleCode},
omsgid = #{omsgid},
oinfno = #{oinfno},
update_id = #{updateId},
update_name = #{updateName},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and visit_id =#{visitId} and settle_id =#{settleId}
